data.text: No rĩrĩ, andũ a bũrũri ũyũ arĩa makoretwo marĩ na mĩnyamaro matigacooka kũgĩa na kĩeha. Mbere ĩyo nĩanyararithirie bũrũri wa Zebuluni na bũrũri wa Nafitali, no mahinda ma thuutha-inĩ nĩagatĩĩithia bũrũri ũrĩa ũgereire iria-inĩ, ũikũrũkanĩtie na Rũũĩ rwa Jorodani, nĩkuo gwĩtagwo Galili-kwa-Ndũrĩrĩ:
Andũ arĩa matũũraga nduma-inĩ
Wee nĩũingĩhĩtie rũrĩrĩ rũu,
Nĩgũkorwo o ta ũrĩa kwarĩ mũthenya ũrĩa Amidiani maahootirwo,
Iraatũ ciothe cia njamba cia ita iria ihũthagĩrwo mbaara-inĩ,
Nĩgũkorwo nĩtũciarĩirwo kaana,
Naguo ũhoro wa gũtheerema kwa ũthamaki wake na thayũ
Mwathani nĩatũmĩte ndũmĩrĩri ya gũũkĩrĩra Jakubu;9:8 Jakubu, Isiraeli, Efiraimu na Samaria ciothe nĩ kuuga Ũthamaki wa Gathigathini; itũũra inene rĩaguo rĩarĩ Samaria.
Nao andũ othe nĩmakamenya ũhoro wayo,
“Maturubarĩ nĩmagwĩte thĩ,
No rĩrĩ, Jehova nĩaheete andũ arĩa marĩ muku na Rezini hinya mamookĩrĩre,
Andũ a Suriata kuuma mwena wa irathĩro,
No rĩrĩ, andũ acio maticookereire ũcio wamahũũrire,
Nĩ ũndũ ũcio Jehova nĩagatinia mũtwe na mũtingʼoe wa Isiraeli,
Athuuri na andũ arĩa marĩ igweta nĩo mũtwe,
Nĩgũkorwo atongoria a andũ aya nĩo mamahĩtithagia,
Nĩ ũndũ ũcio Mwathani ndagakenio nĩ aanake,
Ti-itherũ waganu ũrĩrĩmbũkĩte ta mwaki,
Nĩ ũndũ wa mangʼũrĩ ma Jehova Mwene-Hinya-Wothe
Magaathara irio cia mwena wao wa ũrĩo,
Manase akaarĩa Efiraimu, nake Efiraimu arĩe Manase:
